name: Riot (OiDavo, Cypher-Glitch)
description:
After years political collapse has befallen South Africa, rendering most of the country in a constant state of riot. Gangs have taken over the infrastructure of many towns trapping any remaining residents from leaving.

Enter you a fisherman named Pual, returning from a long deep-sea journey to discover his town in shambles and his family gone. Paul along with his buddies must make their way through various fights and obstacles that stand in their way in order to find their family. 

Note this is a pre-alpha build so only the first level is available. 

OiDavo- Sound Design, Development,  Game Design

Cypher-Glitch - Art, 3D Assets, User Experience, Game Design

Music provided by Scoot Buckley
